SEARCH
Module com.mybank
Package com.mybank

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.mybank.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class for the bank application. Handles user interactions and updates the view and model accordingly. The Controller class is part of the model-view-controller (MVC) design pattern. It is responsible for processing user input, updating the model, and updating the view.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()
      Constructor for the Controller class. Initializes the text fields and text area.

  • Method Details

    • setModel

      public void setModel(Model model)
      Sets the model for this controller.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to be set.

    • setView

      public void setView(View view, javafx.stage.Stage window)
      Sets the view and window for this controller.
      Parameters:
      view - The view to be set.
      window - The window to be set.

    • update

      public void update(String output1, String output2)
      Updates the message and reply text fields. Also disables the text fields to prevent user input during ATM operations.
      Parameters:
      output1 - The text to be set in the message text field.
      output2 - The text to be set in the reply text area.

    • process

      public void process(String action)
      Processes the given action. Actions include number inputs, enter, clear, logout, cancel, deposit, balance, statement, withdraw, transfer, account, Change Password, and Change Overdraft.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to be processed.

    • handleButtonAction

      public void handleButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles button actions.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event to be handled.

    • showAccountManagementWindow

      public void showAccountManagementWindow()
      Shows the account management window. The window displays different options for regular accounts, and overdraft accounts.

    • handleChangePassword

      public void handleChangePassword()
      Handles password changes. Checks if the current password is correct, if the new password and confirmed password match, and if the new password is different from the current password. Displays an alert based on the result.

    • handleOverdraftChange

      public void handleOverdraftChange()
      Handles overdraft changes. Checks if the new overdraft is a positive number, greater than the current balance, and if the account has an overdraft facility. Displays an alert based on the result.

    • showAlert

      public void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content)
      Shows an alert with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      alertType - The type of the alert.
      title - The title of the alert.
      content - The content of the alert.

    • handleLogout

      public void handleLogout(javafx.stage.Stage window, String fxmlFile)
      Handles logout. Logs out the user and loads the login scene by calling the start Method in View.
      Parameters:
      window - The window to be logged out from.
      fxmlFile - The FXML file to be loaded after logout.
